featured_prop.Remarks: An extraordinary estate completely remodeled with a modern twist on Spanish Contemporary style and a five star resort vibe at the exclusive Madison Club! featured_prop.Directions: Contact Listing Agent.
featured_prop.Remarks: Villa Maggio - Designed by Architect Ross Patton for Frank Sinatra in 1970. Located just off Pines to Palms Highway, a short 15 minute drive from Palm Desert. Villa Maggio was named after the character Private Angelo Maggio that Sinatra played in the movie, From Here to Eternity''. He owned the property for 12 years, using it for his own personal use and also hosting members of the Rat Pack, socialites and dignitaries. Rich in Sinatra history, this estate will offer you breathtaking views from Palm Springs to Indio. The integrity of Mr. Sinatra's Secret Hideaway is meticulously protected and maintained by the only other residents since Frank himself held the property. The current owners (also a celebrity family) now proudly offer this classic slice of our American entertainment history, Frank Sinatra'sVilla Maggio.

featured_prop.Remarks: McQueen and Elrod, Hope and Lautner, Cody, and Kaptur are a handful of the names synonymous with living in Southridge, an ultra-exclusive enclave of 18 famed mid-century and modern hillside homes in Palm Springs. At the end of a long, private driveway is the secluded 1965 ultimate desert hideaway blending the sleek style of redwood, post and beam, stone, and glass. Clean, linear rooflines and the walls of glass balanced with natural redwood ceilings and simple, organic finishes throughout create the intended function of mid-century modern indoor/outdoor living. A swimmers 40 foot saltwater lap pool lined with fire features complements the serenity of living in one of the few authentic mid-century hillside homes. The unrestricted valley and city lights views from almost every angle of this glass home complete the one of a kind experience. This is the personal residence of the Smiths, the design team that created both the Korakia and Sparrows Hotels.
